short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip the intro novel, and just display the recipe in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more scrolling through pages of text just to find a recipe! Click anywhere outside the recipe summary popup to view the original page. Works for blogs and sites created with most popular platforms.
